      Team Introduction


      Team Goals


      Saturday Morning Sitrep




      Deliverables Reminder!

      Prior to the first presentation, all teams must submit the below deliverables. Teams that do not will receive an automatic 20pt deduction from their over all score during judging. You can find some example final presentation Github repositories and projects at HackHPC.org The full schedule for the event can be viewed here.

      Due Monday 03/6/23 by 6:00p(EST)/5:00p(CT)/4:00p(PT)
      NOTE: If not posted by due date and time 20pt automatic deduction from final judging score.

      Deliverables Check List:

      • Github Repository Link Posted to the HackHPC Discord "#hackthethreat23" Channel
      • Source code Including Comments
      • README.md with a project description
      • PDF of presentation
        • Team members including mentors/co-mentors with pictures
        • Use of technology in the project
        • Impact of the project on Environmental, Social, and/or Cybersecurity Threats

      TEAM PROJECTS

      2 Hack 2 Furious
      Members:
      [Co-Mentor] Charlie Dey (TACC) , Francesco Strafforello (UBC) , Kai Maurin-Jones (UBC) , Max Bodifee (SFU) , Michelle Yun (UBC) , Ricardo Carvalho (SFU) , [Mentor] Sasmita Mohapatra (TACC) , Seokhyun Yoon (SFU) , Ziggy Cross (UBC)

      ü§† 2 Hack 2 Furious

      [Team Site Link]

      Goal(s): Data De-Sensitizer/Anonymizer

      Members: [Mentor] Sasmita Mohapatra (TACC) , [Co-Mentor] Charlie Dey (TACC) , Ricardo Carvalho (SFU) , Michelle Yun (UBC) , Ziggy Cross (UBC) , Francesco Strafforello (UBC) , Kai Maurin-Jones (UBC) , Max Bodifee (SFU) , Seokhyun Yoon (SFU)
      Theme Song - Side of Smooth - Morning Walk
      Team Trailer

      Tasks: Develop data-cleaning framework, Develop system to evaluate data sensitivity (internally comparable and objectively), Working proof-of-concept,

      Anti-Hurricane Hurricane Club
      Members:
      Ashwin Babu (UBC) , [Co-Mentor] Dawn Hunter (TACC) , [Co-Mentor] Lydia Fletcher (TACC) , Ricky Heinrich (UBC) , Tanmay Agarwal (UBC) , Waiel Tinwala (UBC)

      üò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏è Anti-Hurricane Hurricane Club

      [Team Site Link]

      Goal(s): Dashboard for hurricane effect in Puerto Rico

      Members: [Co-Mentor] Dawn Hunter (TACC) , [Co-Mentor] Lydia Fletcher (TACC) , Ricky Heinrich (UBC) , Tanmay Agarwal (UBC) , Waiel Tinwala (UBC) , Ashwin Babu (UBC)
      Theme Song - Kirin J Callinan - Big Enough
      Team Trailer

      Tasks: Information about dataset (who, what, when, etc), Statistical description of the dataset, Scientific questions we want to answer, Cleaning data, Exploratory analysis, Dashboard design, Dashboard coding

      Techniators
      Members:
      Caesar Wong (UBC) , [Mentor] Esthela Gallardo (Microsoft) , Lisa Sequeira (UBC) , Sarah Abdelazim (UBC)
